features: fights air odors without masking, leaving nothing behind but a light, fresh scent
Hold upright and spray in a sweeping motion throughout your house
Spray every day in bathrooms, kitchens, offices, laundry rooms, and anywhere else you need a burst of ahhh-some
Perfect for whole-home freshness with a 100% natural propellant
body.description: Odors. They're everywhere... lingering in the air or arising at the most awkward times. Forget masking them with some froo-froo spray; Febreze Air Effects actually fights air odors. This can of ahhh-some straight up fights stink with a neat little molecule called cyclodextrin (Bonus: It's naturally made from corn). It's a handy air freshener that's easy to use: Simply spray in a sweeping motion and fight those bad smells anywhere: the bathroom, the kitchen, that cabin you rented for the weekend, the shoe closet, your kids' room... anytime you want an instant burst of fresh. And because Febreze AIR uses 100% natural propellants, you can confidently freshen your home every day. Looking for even more ways to breathe happy with Febreze? Take the freshness on the road with CAR Vent Clips.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Have bought this before. Great for an everyday product. It does it's job. And smells great. Fresh. Gets rid of any odor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I had previously purchased the Gain scented spray and didn't care for it at all and was happy to go back to this heavy duty version which smells great. It only takes a small spray to deodorize, so it lasts a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was reluctant to buy the heavy duty febreeze but glad I did! Wonderful and clean smelling scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Clears the odors but...... Just read the review
reviews.reviewText: I got this spray for our bathrooms. We have a bathroom odor issue with a family member who has colon problems (sorry, TMI, I know). This spray definitely clears the bad poo odors but replaces it with an overly scented artificial flowery, chemical smell. It's not terrible, it's just STRONG. It's still embarrassing for the family member to come out of the bathroom still trailing a (different) toxic cloud. We've experimented with spraying just a little - a spritz - but that's not enough to clear the poo smell. I still prefer using this spray over others that try to cover the smell without eliminating it. Make sense? I hope so.I AM going to purchase this product again - in a different scent - and see if that is better. If you have a difficult odor problem - by all means, try this, it will definitely help. You may even like this scent - Heavy Duty - Crisp Clean in which case you'll be very happy and give it a full 5 stars across the board. I just personally need a little less 'toxic waste ebatement' and a little more 'fresh laundry & spring flowers'.PS - If you give the bathroom (or wherever) a heavy spray, it does last a good long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good air freshener
reviews.reviewText: This works well for getting rid of the smell of cigarette smoke without having an overpowering aroma to it. You don’t need to use a lot so I find that it lasts longer than other air fresheners I’ve tried. I would recommend using it if you’re looking for a pleasant smell along with effective air freshening. Obviously the opinion on a “pleasant scent” is subjective and everyone has different tastes. If you’re looking for something overpowering, fruity or woody then this isn’t the air freshener for you, but if you are looking for something with a mild aroma yet is effective enough to remove the smell cigarette smoke in a room that is about 12’ x 20’ feet, then this is for you. I use cigarette smoke for illustration purposes because that’s what I use this for, but you could use it to get rid of any odor you don’t care for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very neutral scent perfect for home
reviews.reviewText: I hate most air fresheners because i feel like the oder can be overwhelming and just mask the bad smells. This one on the other hand is perfect. I use all the time near my cat liter box.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works Well, But Doesn't Remove Pet Enzyme Remover Fragrance Odors
reviews.reviewText: Ok, I'm really going to say this is about a 4.5. Febreze, Lysol, and Nature's Miracle pet enzyme remover make our household go around. And even if it didn't, I'd probably keep buying this just because my daughter likes to run around the house spraying it as she proclaims it to be her superpower. Normally, we buy it at Costco, but life happens, we were running out, and I wasn't going to be able to set foot in a store conveniently for a few days, so I ordered from Amazon.There were no condition issues with the product we received. I'm saying it's a 4.5 because it's no match for Nature's Miracle...meaning, you can still smell both of their pet enzyme products I own after liberally dousing it with this febreze product, so it may not eliminate all smells. I happen to really like the smell of the new citrus nature's miracle we purchased, but I've gotten really burnt out on the smell of the other stuff, and my husband ordered us a second gallon of it, not realizing I was sick of the smell and we already had one sitting in the cupboard. Naturally, I'd rather smell this, since I actually really like the smell of this particular febreze product. But no luck...it didn't even dent the Nature's Miracle armor. Which is great for getting rid of cat pee, bad if you don't like the smell of the enzyme remover. So, just be prepared...it will help with the vast majority of odors you find unpleasant, but not all of them.I haven't had any problems with these particular cans, but I purchase the same type of spray cans from Costco, and every now and then something goes wrong in the spray mechanism and you end up with a mostly full bottle of febreze you can't access safely or use. Otherwise, we love this product, and it's a great super power for dealing with some of the stink life can throw your way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Smells great! I have it on auto delivery to keep my house fresh smelling and disinfected!
After shipping costs it is way to expensive,3 cans cost 43 dollars,I can't return it😡
